1:
Shout joyfully to Yahweh, all the earth.
\q
2:
Serve Yahweh with gladness;
\q come before his presence with joyful singing.
4:
Enter into his gates with thanksgiving
\q and into his courts with praise.
\q Give thanks to him and bless his name.
\q
5:
For Yahweh is good; his covenant faithfulness endures forever
\q and his truthfulness through all generations.
